page.title: 12Home Life(2)
page.content: In my spare time I go out to play or watch television.If I go out to play I like to ride my bike around the garden and play with my brothers.I watch television on average about three hours a day.I also enjoy doing crosswords.My mum and dad use up their spare time cooking,washing and cleaning and looking after me and my brothers.When we all go out together at the weekend we usually go to the Forest of Dean. A lot of people who live in our area keep pets.The older people usually have either cats or dogs because they are good company.Children have got rabbits,hamsters and guinea-pigs.They need a lot of care and cleaning out.A good number of children have pets;it is over several million.Pets are nice to have.
